title: Does giving up on God make you less moral? Jordan Peterson/Dillahunty Q/A #2 Part 1
description:
Does a person really change morally when they give up God? This is part 1 of that exchange. Part 2 deals with whether society changes when it gives up on God. 

Full conversation https://youtu.be/FmH7JUeVQb8
